category-def.name: org.eclipse.passage.lic.category
category-def.label: Passage LIC
category-def.description: Passage Licensing Integration Components includes: Licensing Runtime API and its implementation for Eclipse Equinox, Licensing JFace components, Licensing Metadata EMF API, License Management Integrations
